alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beaverhead County through 545 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Lima, or 28 miles south of Dillon, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clark Canyon and Dell. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 24 and 47 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
